intro: Celsia zaianensis, commonly known as the Zaian celsia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth texture. Celsia zaianensis is often found in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun.
